messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is Extreme difficulty in the skill value?
equal to or below one-fifth of the skill value
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What situations might cause Extreme difficulty?
in the most extreme and dire situations, such as being shot at or pursued, or when conditions are uniquely appalling
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an example of a skill requiring Extreme difficulty in Demolitions?
defuse an explosive device of a radically different design to any seen before, perhaps of futuristic or alien origin
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an example of a skill requiring Extreme difficulty in Electrical Repair?
working on futuristic or alien technology that uses a form of electronics
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an example of a skill requiring Extreme difficulty in Listen?
Eavesdropping on a quiet conversation in an extremely noisy environment
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is an example of a skill requiring Extreme difficulty in Locksmith?
Opening a high security lock with only a piece of wire (i.e. no tools); crack open the most secure of bank vaults
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the minimum percentage required to read someone's intent or determine they are lying?
You are a helpful AI assistant.

Electronics
